mapper.select: SELECT ct_idx, ct_name, sum(pd_cnt) as pd_cnt , sum(sales_cnt) as sales_cnt, sum(sales_cnt) / sum(pd_cnt) as odCnt_per_pdCnt FROM (SELECT p.pd_idx, (select ct_name from category_t where ct_idx = p.ct_idx) as ct_name, p.ct_idx, p.pd_name, pd_cnt, IFNULL(SUM(od.od_cnt), 0) AS sales_cnt FROM product_t p LEFT JOIN order_detail_t od ON p.pd_idx = od.pd_idx WHERE p.ct_idx IN(SELECT ct_idx FROM category_t) GROUP BY p.pd_idx, p.pd_name, p.pd_cnt ) AS turn GROUP BY ct_idx
